summary: The Architect of the Capitol administers contracts to acquire goods and services for the U.S. Capitol complex. In 2015, questions arose regarding the wages for workers employed by the Senate's food service contractor. We reviewed the AOC's oversight of this contract and found that it had considered this contractor's performance satisfactory in 2015, and extended its contract for another 7 years. However, after the wage...
title: Architect of the Capitol's Oversight of the Senate Food Service Contract
